backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining store management types, authorization, user profiles, and creation/update operations for stores, sectors, products, and deliveries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping mobile‑responsiveness and HUD improvements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file listing short summaries for all major frontend components, hooks, game systems, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file that sets up the root React mount point and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, profile setup flow, title screen, and transition to the game scene.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity authentication and clearing query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog for creating a user profile with form validation and mobile‑friendly layout.
frontend/src/components/StoreInitializer: Automated store setup component that creates the store, adds all sectors and products, and shows progress feedback.
About dialog showing game information and copyright notice with a simple modal UI.
frontend/src/features/sectors/sectorCons: Defines sector metadata including icons and descriptions, and provides a helper to fetch definitions by name.
frontend/src/features/sectors/SectorsPan: Renders a panel listing each sector with stock, value, staff, and cleanliness using fetched sector data.
frontend/src/game/data/initialProducts.t: Provides a static list of initial products with pricing, sectors, and shelf-life data.
frontend/src/game/GameHUD.tsx: Displays top and bottom HUD elements showing funds, reputation, time, controls, and a sectors panel toggle.
frontend/src/game/GameScene.tsx: Initializes store state, loads sector data, and renders the main game canvas with the HUD once ready.
frontend/src/game/render/GameCanvas.tsx: Draws the game scene on a canvas, handling resizing, scaling, grid rendering, and customer visualization.
frontend/src/game/sim/initialState.ts: Creates the starting game state with default values for time, customers, employees, and cleanliness.
frontend/src/game/sim/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for game state, customers, and employees.
Runs the game loop, advancing time, moving customers, and periodically spawning new ones based on tick rate.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth state, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as user profiles, store sectors, products, funds, reputation, and deliveries.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode, safe-area utilities, and mobile-friendly layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/TitleScreen.tsx: Renders the title screen UI with a start button, login button, and about dialog atop a styled background.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, screens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the game’s high-level project state, including vision, architecture notes, and a list of implemented features for the browser-based tycoon game. Captures versioning, issues, and core systems already planned or built.
